channel.title: Best way for a delta compiler :)
channel.description:
[code]@echo off :build if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You Havent Downloaded Java .... :end echo Finished! pause goto :build[/code]
This compiler allows you to compile as many times as you want without it closing allowing you to not have to minimize a project, and just click file, save, and then click the compiler on your taskbar and press space or whatever and it'll compile without closing.
No problem ;).
